title: Textra SMS
description:
Want a beautiful, super fast and highly customizable alternative to your stock Android messaging app? Well today is your day. Textra is simply outstanding!

Comes with a bunch of great features, notably 100+ material design theme / bubble / app icon colors, dark, light & auto-night modes, bubble styles, scheduled (future) SMS & MMS, delayed sending (stop while sending), slide to delete / call, quick snap camera, multi-select picture gallery, quick reply popup, awesome MMS GROUP messaging, quick voice memos, GIFs, 21 text sizes, blocker / blacklisting, auto video & picture compression and lots more...

Customize your preferred bubble colors, signatures and notifications (icon color, LED color, sound, vibration, privacy, reminders and muting) PER CONVERSATION as well.

World First: Get the latest 1600+ Android, Twitter, Emoji One & iOS style emojis including diversity (skin tone). Just pick your preferred emoji style, easy!

It's pretty special; try it, tell your friends, shout from the treetops, but most of all enjoy it!

Simple. Beautiful. Fast.

All Textra features are free forever. Occasionally you'll see an ad, or you can choose to make an in-app purchase to never see ads.

Compatible with Pushbullet and MightyText for desktop notifications and replying. 

Full Android Wear Notification support including conversation history and quick reply.

IMPORTANT: Textra does not support DUAL-SIM devices yet.

Support / Knowledge Base / Feedback @ https://textra.uservoice.com
short_desc: Textra is a seriously beautiful, feature rich SMS and MMS app.
what_is_new:
✔ NICE! Added Text Color options in the Bubble Color picker.
✔ Added option to auto-close the keyboard after sending. See Textra Settings > Close Keyboard after Sending
✔ In notifications we now support expanded image / picture notifications.
✔ Added a 'Conversation Context' (message history) page on Android Wear.
✔ Improved launch performance.
✔ Improved the GIF screen design.
✔ Improved Android N Notification and Quick Reply support.
✔ Bug fixes.
Change Log @ http://inapp.textra.me/changelog
